entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 13 March 2023
